name: wordget
description: A Wordle clone that works offline and saves daily progress

scripts.build: bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir dist && cp src/index.html dist/ && sed -i "s/'REPLACE_WITH_GIT_SHA'/'$COMMIT_REF'/g" dist/index.html && cp src/style.css dist/ && cp src/manifest.json dist/ && cp ./sw.js dist/ && cp ./icon.svg dist/

author: Wordget Developer
